1.content:
One day Richard was going about his daily routine of sleeping late and missing class when a certain photograph caught his eye it was a picture of his most admired rock and roll guitaris Jimi Hendrix, he stared at it from his unmade bed wondering what it would be like to step into the shoes of his idols and witness first hand the lives they lived. He silently muttered to himself

'I'd do anything for a glimps of life on the other side...'

All of a sudden the family photo album begun to glow a satanic red Richard jumped up and ran over the the mysterious tome.

Richard pulled open the album and was confronted by equally satanic coloured images, the first a picture of his sister's on holiday in the South of France all of his sisters were posing on balchony looking as if they were getting raedy for a night in town. This was the most recent photo taken only half a year ago.

The second picture was of his parents on their wedding day 22 years ago his mother wearing a stunning white dress, his father wearing a quite dapper suit.

Richard then spied a picture in the courner of his eye the satanic colours shone from a secret pile he kept under his bed. This was a picture of Richard's Ex-Girfriend one of Richard's most viewed upon images a semi-nude photo of his ex covered barely by a matching panties and bra combination.

A fourth photo shone this time from Richard's wall it was a picture of Richard and his friend mack with ex-girlfriend Amy travelling to a Motorhead gig in Cardiff 2 years ago Raichad was wearing his Motorhead t-shirt and usual blue jeans, Mack was wearing a bright green punk t-shirt with tarton trousers, and Amy was wearing a short leather skirt and small heels.

Richard heard a voice in his head:

'You have been given the chance to recreate the lives of one of these photographed people, choose wisely my friend'

Richard started considering without hesitation he thought it might be cool to see the south of France with his sisters a holiday they they insisted who wouldn't join them on. He knew he wasn't going to recreate his parents wedding night although he did apreciate the trippiness of th ordeal. He considered assuming the life of his ex-girlfriend as who was always to see what it would be like to live on the other side.

112.content:
Richard closed his eyes for a moment and when he re-opened them he found himself standing amongst his sisters on the balcony in France. Richard looked down at himself and saw he was wearing the yellow and white sun dress his sister was wearing in the picture he was previously holding. Richard was surprised, he didn't expect this trick to actually work! Richard then noticed who it was holding the camera, it was Ashley's French boyfriend Pierre. Amy quickly walked over to him and planted a kiss on his lips and thanked him for taking such a 'cute' picture.

'Oh my God Macy you look so precious in this picture!' Gushed Ashley 'If only you were old enough to come clubbing with us later, I bet you could turn some heads even at your age!'

Richard blushed, he felt a bit weird being called 'precious' but he would be fooling himself if he didn't admit it did make him feel a little good.

'Oh yes, plenty of my friends would love to show you a good time around the city young Macy.' Added Pierre 'I can maybe find you a fake I.D if you would be willing to take the risk?'

At this point Jenna got outraged at this idea.

'There is absolutely no way you are getting my little sister a fake I.D!! She can make some friends in the teen club run by the hotel tonight' Jenna turned and faced Richard and said 'There will plenty of time to go clubbing and find boys when your old enough, we can have some fun together at the beach together tomorrow.'

'Why do you have to be such a party pooper Jenna?' Questioned Amy 'If your gonna treat her like a kid why don't you both put on your nighties and watch Disney movies all night!?' Amy and Pierre laughed to themselves and left together.

Jenna was still angry but she didn't respond to Amy's latest jab she just turned to Richard and told him.

'If your gonna go to the teen club you better get changed you've been wearing the dress all day!'

'Oh of course I'd better go get myself ready' replied Richard.

Richard scurried to what he assumed was Macy's room and analysed the situation.....

Jenna called her brother Richard back in the UK on her mobile phone.The new Ashley wondered how the old one liked her new life as her younger brother.Richard suggests they go to a restaurant as he enjoys his cigarette and the night air.Macy agreed heartily picking a posh one.Richard wanted to see if he could speak French now that he was Ashley.He tried to tell Pierre that he didn't think they should have sex with his sisters staying with them.He said it perfectly.Pierre said back annoyed you told me it wouldn't be a problem.

121.content: Richard saw he was in a lovely garden dressed in his mother's wedding gown.He had heavy makeup on his face.His hair was much longer and arranged in an updo.He walked away from his dad who looked very young now.He didn't realize he was walking perfectly in high heels.Richard was saying"Not my mother!Not her!"David Plumber followed him saying"Kathy,love what's the matter?"Richard didn't want to mess up his parents special day but he didn't think he could go through with this."I need to be alone for a minute Dad-I mean David."he said.Richard's aunt Elizabeth,his mother's maid of honor who had been with the rest of the bridal party went after him as his father backed away."You too Aunt-Liz.I'm sorry."Richard said.Richard thought about it.He was the bride.Everyone would have to kiss his ass.This might be fun.He returned to his spot next to his father who looked concerned and took his hand.Richard noticed his nails were manicured.He smiled at David and asked him if his makeup was ok.The 22 year old plumber told his new wife she looked perfect.His dad had never looked at him that way.The photographer took a picture when the couple was ready.

info.brief_description: A story which follows one characters indulgence into other's lives.
info.description:
As I alluded to before this story is a life swap story. Your main character 'Richard' has been given the opportunity (sp?) to witness new perspectives and lifestyles by just placing his hand on a picture/film/recording of another person. He will then assume that life as if he had been living it for his entire life everyone will recognise acknowladge and respsond to him as if he were always that person.

All clothes and and other specialised characteristics will be accounted for. While in the life of another person the role of Richard will be played by whoever the swap first occured.

Characters-

Family-
Richard- 19 College Student United Kingdom

Jenna- 17 High School Student United Kingdom (Richard's younger sister)

Macy- 15 Boarding School Student United Kingdom (Richard's youngest sister)

Ashley- 21 Receptionist France (Richard's oldest sister)

David- 44 Plumber (Richard's father)

Kathleane- 39 Cook (Richard's mother)

Friends-

Mack- 25 Pizza Delivery Boy (Richard's Best Friend)

Amy- 19 Colles Student (Richard's Ex-Girlfriend)

You can make up other characters if you want and don't worry about propper grammer and that as long as it's readable ;)
